```{r setup}
library(blockchainR)
```

Initialization of the chain 

```{r}
chain <- blockchainR::blockchain$new()
```

```{r}
chain$print_chain()
```

```{r}
chain$generate_key("private.pem","public.pem")
```


```{r}
chain$new_transaction("private.pem","someone",30)
chain$transaction_queue

chain$new_block()$add_block()$chain_validation()

```

```{r}
chain$balances()
```
